title: Shroud of Turin - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/21/19
itunes:title: Shroud of Turin - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/21/19
description:
George Noory and researcher Barrie Schwortz explore his work studying the Shroud of Turin, the history of Christian artwork, and whether he believes the shroud contains an authentic image of Jesus Christ.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
